Table of Contents

Class RelativeFileManager<T, TService>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.Controller.Common
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.Controller.dll

Class with base implementation of ICRUDManager interface for relative file models (selected and ignored file models).

Inheritance: BaseManager<T, TService> -> RelativeFileManager<T, TService>
Implements: ICRUDManager<T, TService>, IManager<T, TService> 

public abstract class RelativeFileManager<T, TService> : BaseManager<T, TService>, IRelativeFileManager<T, TService>, ICRUDManager<T, TService>, IManager<T, TService> where T : RelativeFile where TService : RelativeFileService<T>

Type Parameters

T

Type of relative file model.

TService

Service handling collection of object of specified model.

public RelativeFileManager(TService service)

Parameters

service TService

The instance of service associated with this class.

Remarks

SelectedItem is set to -1 and Service to specified value.

Delete(int)

Deletes from the service's collection all elements connected with the item with specified identifier. Removing every element includes also removing all elements of other models that are connected with it.

public bool Delete(int mainDirectoryId)

Parameters

mainDirectoryId int

The identifier of main directory object, that object to delete are connected to.

Returns

bool

true if all elements was successfully deleted; otherwise false.

RelativeFile

Select(int)

Selects the item from service's collection.

public override void Select(int mainDirectoryId)

Parameters

mainDirectoryId int

The identifier of the main directory object, that elements to select are connected with.

Remarks

Asks user for appropriate data and selects the item (sets SelectedItem value) based on the input. Selection is possible only between elements of the collection that are connected with the specified main directory.
